name: A Vision
description:
Is the another world just your vision?

Tutorial

WASD / Arrow Keys to move and control direction when dashing.

Z to dash

Space to jump

R to Respawn

ESC to Back to Title

Alt F4 to leave the game

===

Made in FGJ2019TP / Made by GroupD

Program：楓葉綠茶 / ハル / / 王小明 / 弘展

Art：Ahhchao

Stage：All members

Music：魔王魂 https://maoudamashii.jokersounds.com/

===

Known bug

-Do not beside wall, press move key and jump together

-Border angels of block may cause abnormal status(hang in the air)
